title: Labor systems in Latin America, Oceania, Africa

content.question:
Analyze continuities and changes in labor systems between 1450 and 1900 in ONE of the following regions.

Latin America and the Caribbean

Oceania

Sub-Saharan Africa

frqParts.text:
Analyze continuities and changes in labor systems between 1450 and 1900 in ONE of the following regions.

Latin America and the Caribbean

Oceania

Sub-Saharan Africa

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
